```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)

enrollment <- read_xlsx("class_enrollment_summary_by_term_9.24.19.xlsx", skip = 3)

```

```{r}
enrollment %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  filter(course_department == "Government") %>%
  arrange(desc(total)) %>%
  select(course_title, course_name, course_department, total) %>%
  head(4)
```
